results.text_hl: Consequently, the levels of expression of the various transporters (OCTs, @GENE_SLC29A4 @GENE_222962 @@@PMAT@@@, and MATEs) on @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cells would determine their sensitivity to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and the extent to which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can exert its inhibitory effect on @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cell proliferation, invasion, and @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@ while inducing apoptotic cell death.

results.title: Mechanisms of metformin inhibiting cancer invasion and migration.
results.text_hl: Moreover, multiple evidence suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ invasion and @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@metastasis@@@, which could improve the prognosis of @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ administrated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin Inhibits Tumor Metastasis through Suppressing Hsp90alpha Secretion in an AMPKalpha1-PKCgamma Dependent Manner
results.text_hl: Still, rHsp90alpha cannot fully rescue the inhibitory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@tumor metastasis@@@, which means there are other unknown pathways for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ that can inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@tumor metastasis@@@.
